resources.string: Below you will find a list of features you are able to view.

In order to view your data in the field, you must first ensure that you have downloaded your data and forms using the \"Import\" module (see below and follow associated instructions before returning here).

In order to view your data in the field, you must first ensure that you have downloaded your data and forms using the \"Import\" module (see below and follow associated instructions before returning here).
You are using the MapMint application for Monitoring and Evaluation called MapMint4ME.

In order to view your data in the field, you must first ensure that you have downloaded your data and forms using the \"Import\" module (see below and follow associated instructions before returning here).
Before going to the field to collect data, please ensure that you have downloaded the latest version of the Data and related Templates. Once complete, you will be able to start recording your data.
Once you have completed your field data collection, you can use the Export button below to post your data back to the MapMint server.
You have not configured any MapMint Server, please configure one.
Your are using the MapMint4ME application. It is provided free of charge under the term of the MIT/X11 License and aims to provide an easy to use editing tool for your own data on the field.
The software has been developped and published on GooglePlayâ„¢ by GeoLabs SARL.
In case you want to learn how to use this application, please click

• Import your data

    To get started, you need to configure a MapMint server from which you will be able to download a local copy of your data for offline editing.

  • Editing data in the field

    Either with or without internet connectivity, you can collect the data you want in the field.

  • Export your data

    At the end of your field work or once you have internet connectivity, simply click the export button within the Export module to post your records to the MapMint server!
Firstly, download your data using the Import module!
As a minimum, you will need at least one MapMint server configured!
Configure your application to access the MapMint server!
Then click the Add server button!
Press the Import button and wait for your data to download.
Use the Edit module to collect your data in the field.
Use the Export module to post your data back to the MapMint server.
You should be ready to start using the MapMint4ME application.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
Camera permission is needed to run this application
This device does not support AR.
Reorder and set this cube to the first.
Move on x and z axis.
